alert.note: Alert for Torrance (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 4:29PM MDT until May 26 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Torrance County in central New Mexico... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 429 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles south of Clines Corners, or 17 miles east of Estancia, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Encino. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 223 and 244. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 236 and 256. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central New Mexico.
